member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.SmoMetadataProvider.Config.SmoInitFields
member.summary: Defines initialization field list for different SMO object types. Each configuration includes an optimized and safe field list. Theoretically we could vary these fields per-engined type should the set of properties not exist everywhere, but that set of properties is currently empty.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.SmoMetadataProvider.SmoMetadataProvider
member.summary: Represents an object that uses SMO to retrieve server metadata objects.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.SmoMetadataProvider.SmoMetadataProvider.CreateConnectedProvider(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Common.ServerConnection)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the that uses the specified SMO connection to retrieve server metadata objects over the SMO.
member.param: A object that is used to retrieve server metadata objects.
member.returns: A object that uses the specified connection to retrive server metadata.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.SmoMetadataProvider.SmoMetadataProvider.CreateConnectedProvider(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Common.ServerConnection,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the that uses the specified connection to retrieve server metadata objects over the SMO.
member.param: A object that is used to retrieve server metadata objects.

An value that specifies the time interval, in milliseconds, between database list refreshes. The database refresh updates the list of accessible databases, basing this evaluation on whether the database is on or offline, and whether the database is in single or multi-user mode.
member.returns: A object that uses the specified connection to retrive server metadata.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.SmoMetadataProvider.SmoMetadataProvider.CreateDisconnectedProvider(Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.Smo.Server)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the that uses the specified SMO server object to retrieve metadata objects.
member.param: A SMO object that is used to retrieve metadata objects.
member.returns: A object that uses the specified connection to retrive server metadata.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.SmoMetadataProvider.Database.MetadataList`2
member.summary: This helper class retrieves a collection of SMO objects from the database SMO object and provides retrieval of those object for each schema in the database.
member.remarks: This class relies on the assumption that objects in the collection are order by schema name. If this is not true the per-schema grouping will be incorrect. This class copies all objects in the collection of objects specified to a single-dimension array. It uses an internal lookup table that associate a range of elements in the array to a schema name.
member.typeparam: Type of the SMO object to be retrieved.
Type of the SMO collection that contains the objects.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.SmoMetadataProvider.Database.MetadataList`2.#ctor(`1,System.Int32,Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.SmoMetadataProvider.Database)
member.summary: Constructs a new MetadataList object for the given collection of SMO objects.
member.param: Collection of SMO objects to be grouped by their schema names.
Number of schemas in the database.
Database object the metadata belongs to.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SqlServer.Management.SmoMetadataProvider.Database.MetadataList`2.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an iterator for SMO objects that belong to the specified schema.
member.param: Name of the schema to get items for.
member.returns: An iterator of all objects the belong to the specified schema.
